name: Fruit Jam - Sweet Match 3 Puzzle
description:
Fruit Jam is a new and stylish fruit match 3 puzzle game. Available for all ages. Brand new visual effect and game experience. Simple to start but challenging to master! No time-limited that you can play anywhere & anytime offline. 

Start your adventure filled with fruits： 

  • Swipe and match 3 fruits of the same color to blast and win points!
  • Match 5 fruits to create a magic bomb 
  • Collect the fruits, the break can help you complete the levels 
  • Use powerful boosters candy to crush the ice layers. 

Fruit Jam Features: 

  • Addictive fruit match 3 puzzle game 
  • Puzzle levels full of fruits and 100+ levels. 
  • Well-designed in sweet graphics & interface 
  • Relaxing background music & Amazing animations 
  • Free game that can play any time and anywhere! 

Fruit Jam is a good game you must fall in love with once when you play it first. It's a puzzle, board and entertaining free match game for anybody to enjoy! Try our Fruit Jam - match 3 puzzle game and Play OFFLINE/FREE at any time, anywhere either Phone or tablet!

Get It On AMAZON APPSTORE https://Amzn.to/3aMDXLl
